title: Expectations and Notifications
description: Specifies which trips users are expected to label and when they should be reminded to do so

modes.description: The various modes we can be in and their specifications. The active mode is the first mode in this list with a schedule matching the current date or with no schedule.

contains.$comment: Must contain a "default" element -- one with no schedule

modeType.description: Specifies a collection mode that defines expectation and notification settings for a given time period

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable this mode; mode is enabled if this property is omitted

label.description: A human-readable label for the mode

confidenceThreshold.description: Only display yellow labels with confidence greater than this threshold (0 to display all, 1 to display none)

draftDelay.description: Avoid processing new draft trips for this number of hours, then, if they still have not been confirmed, treat them as if they have all red labels

rules.description: A list of rules that define the expectation and notification settings for label types

contains.$comment: Must contain a rule for red labels
Must contain a rule for all yellow labels

scheduleType.description: Describes when the mode is active; omit to make always active

startDate.description: The base date from which to measure time

duration.description: How long the mode lasts in days

ruleType.description: Specifies the expectation and notification settings for a given label type trigger

trigger.description: The type of label that this rule applies to: -1 for red labels, 0.0<=x<=1.0 for all yellow labels with confidence <= x, regardless of whether confidenceThreshold allows us to display them (1 for all yellow labels)

allOf.$comment: If no labeling expectation, do not send a notification; should not even configure
The only way for a "notify" field to not exist is if there is no labeling expectation

expectType.description: Specifies whether the user must label all of the trips with the associated trigger, none of them, or somewhere in between

type.description:
"all": must label all trips
"randomFraction": must label a certain fraction of trips
"randomDays": must label for a certain number of days per week
"none": not expected to label any trips

value.$comment:
If "type" is "randomFraction": this is the fraction (0.0, 1.0) of trips that must be labeled
If "type" is "randomDays": this is the number of days per week [1, 6] for which trips must be labeled

value.description: The fraction (0.0, 1.0) of trips that must be labeled
The number of days per week [1, 6] for which trips must be labeled

notifyType.description: Specifies when the user should be notified to complete the expected labeling, if at all

type.description:
"immediately": notify as soon as the label data comes in
"dayEnd": notify at the end of each day
"nDays": notify every certain number of days
"weekDay": notify on a certain day of the week
"none": do not notify

value.$comment:
If "type" is "nDays": this is the number [1, Infinity) of days we wait in between notifications
If "type" is "weekDay": this is the number of the day [1=Monday, 7=Sunday] on which we notify

value.description: The number [1, Infinity) of days we wait in between notifications
The number of the day [1=Monday, 7=Sunday] on which we notify
